description: This TRAP is sent by the D5 UEQ if it receives a request
for a licensed feature, but the free pool of available
permanent licenses is exhausted. It is resent at the

event.Summary: Free pool of permanent licenses exhausted. Licenses in use: $v3

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LMNoKeyAvailable ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicenseAllocationType i 1 ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesAllocated s EXAMPLE ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesInUse u 9999

description: The total number of licenses in this allocation.
variables.name: ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesAllocated

description: The number of licenses in this allocation that is currently in
use. A higher number in use than allocated indicates the presence
of temporary licenses. The number of temporary licenses can be
determined by subtracting d5LicensesAllocated from d5LicensesInUse.
variables.name: ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesInUse

description: This TRAP is sent by the D5 UEQ when the grace period for a
Temporary license expires and a feature is revoked.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LMServicePeriodExpire ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicenseAllocationType i 1 ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesAllocated s EXAMPLE ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesInUse u 9999 ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicenseIndex u 1

description: The total number of licenses in this allocation.
variables.name: ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesAllocated

description: The number of licenses in this allocation that is currently in
use. A higher number in use than allocated indicates the presence
of temporary licenses. The number of temporary licenses can be
determined by subtracting d5LicensesAllocated from d5LicensesInUse.
variables.name: ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicensesInUse

description: A feature specific unique identifier for this license.
variables.name: ARRIS-D5-LICENSE-MIB::d5LicenseIndex
